rooms.description: Serves as the entry point with reception area.
Contemporary living space with ample natural light and Vastu compliant placement to ensure harmony.
Adjacent to the kitchen for an open-concept design.
Modern design with efficient layout and adherence to local building codes.
Accommodates two cars with additional storage space under local norms.

openings.description: Vastu-compliant entrance to promote positive energy flow.
Large windows for ample natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with attached private balcony ensuring a serene view.
Secondary bedroom designed for comfort and privacy.
Equipped area for fitness activities, designed as per local building norms.
Modern bathroom with necessary fixtures and Vastu compliance.

openings.description: Connects ground floor to first floor ensuring accessibility.
Provides natural ventilation and a view, aligning with Vastu principles for the master bedroom.

rooms.description: Open-air terrace for relaxation and social gatherings. Designed to harness natural cooling and offer scenic views.
